mapper.select: select 번호, 등록코드,거래처코드,결제방식,결제일자,결제코드,거래량 from (select ROWNUM as 번호, 등록코드,거래처코드,결제방식,결제일자,결제코드,거래량 from T_VIEW_PROD_HISTORY where ROWNUM <1000) where 번호 between 1 and 10
CALL Pro_Stat_Chart(#{counst},0,#{chart_Plan1, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet, resultMap=chart_Plan1})
